name: Worduel
description:
"local, turn-based, 5-to-6-letter, 1v1-style 'wordle' clone"

Both sides have different words and the rest should be self-explanatory, given you've played 'Wordle' before.

Play with someone else either screen sharing on in person. Either way, pretty competitive, but also fun.

If you wish to play without the embed, here is the GitHub Pages link.
